AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: T.1 Douglas Fir - 2m Lateral reduction of over-extended scaffold limb over driveway to suitable growth point, Remove all deadwood and Ivy.T.2 Douglas Fir - Fell.T.3 Douglas Fir - 1m Lateral reduction of over-extended scaffold limb over driveway to suitable growth point, Remove all deadwood and Ivy.T.4 Douglas Fir - 1m Lateral reduction of over-extended scaffold limb over driveway to suitable growth point, Remove all deadwood and Ivy.T.5 Western Red Cedar - Fell (causing structural damage).T.6 Weeping Willow - 50% pollard in order to prevent failure (All Ivy to be removed and the tree further inspected, if the removal of the tree is then necessitated on health and safety grounds, photo evidence to be sent to the tree Officer).T.7 Eucalyptus - 5m Holistic crown reduction/reshape to previous points & deadwood.T.8 Goat Willow - Fell.H.9 Cypress Hedge - Exempt from application.
